item.title: Alter-Conf is coming to Berlin!
item.description: AlterConf - a travelling conference about diversity and for marginalized people and their friends in tech - is coming to Berlin on May 13. They are looking for Speakers, Volunteers, Freelancers and Sponsors! Apply till April 1st.
